in_ports.name: map_buffer_id
in_ports.hint: ID of some existing map buffer.

out_ports.name: map_buffer_id
out_ports.hint:
Copy of input "map_buffer_id".
Note that you CANNOT use this ID to access the map buffer,
if you did not set the flag "Skip action": the buffer is removed!

controls.caption: Do action
controls.name: doAction
controls.description:
If cleared, this function does nothing and returns an empty scalar. You may use this flag if you need to remove the map buffer not always, but, for example, only after the last iteration of some loop.
Usually this flag is set.
